column4: this needs to be done offline tho - from within a live CD session or similar. mount your partitions (the old / and the new /) and run this command.   rsync -av /path/to/old /path/to/new
then what you'll need  to do is edit your /etc/fstab file and change the partition for /
/etc/fstab would be something like /path/to/old/etc/fstab (from within your live CD session)
